fields.name: Reboot
fields.command:
echo Rebooting. 
reboot || echo reboot failed

fields.name: PowerOff
fields.command:
echo Powering Off.
poweroff || echo PowerOff failed.

fields.name: iPXE Shell
fields.command:
echo Launching interactive iPXE Shell
shell || echo Failed to launch interactive iPXE Shell.

fields.name: Demo boot.salstar.sk
fields.description: Boot from External Demo at http://boot.salstar.sk

fields.name: Ubuntu Live (LTS)
fields.description: Boot latest Ubuntu Live Linux LTS version.

fields.name: Desinfec't 2016
fields.command:
isset ${http_storage_baseurl} || goto missing_http_storage_baseurl
isset ${nfs_storage_root} || goto missing_nfs_storage_root 

set http_baseurl=${http_storage_baseurl}/desinfect2016
set nfs_root=${nfs_storage_root}/desinfect2016
set lang={{ settings.langcode_ISO_639_1|default:"de" }}
set keyboard={{ settings.langcode_ISO_639_1|default:"de" }}

:boot_section
kernel ${http_baseurl}/vmlinuz netboot=nfs nfsroot=${nfs_root} boot=casper quiet splash -- debian installer/language=${lang} console-setup/layoutcode?=${keyboard}
initrd ${http_baseurl}/initrd.lz
boot

:missing_http_storage_baseurl
echo http_storage_baseurl has not been configured, unable to locate required files. && goto reconnect_delay

:missing_nfs_storage_root 
echo nfs_storage_root has not been configured, unable to locate required files. && goto reconnect_delay
